Package util

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ClientMessageController
    This class will help us the control all the messages that the client and the server sending.
    FilesHandler
    This class helps us to save the file that given from the server from the blob table after uploading the pdf file.
    MailService
    Using this class, the application can send emails (for exmaple: if the manager accepted the order, and etc).
    ManageClients
    Handle common actions for all clients
    ManageData  
    ManageScreens
    Controlling flow of screens
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Commands
    Commands defined between server and client
    Messages
    Commands defined the messages for the notification center.
    NotificationType  
    Screens
    Screen the defined for client in the system
    Status
    User(client) status in the system
    UserType
    Types of user in the system
